name: Average 2014 FIFA World Cup Quiz | 10 Questions | Sports

questions.text: In the group stage, the United States lost only one of their three games. Which team did they lose to?
questions.explanation:
Germany.

	The United States lost to Germany by one, tied Portugal, and beat Ghana by one. The US did not play Belgium until the round of 16.

questions.text: In a match against Italy, Uruguayan player Luis Suarez gets caught and suspended from future matches because of his actions. What did Suarez do to get suspended?
questions.explanation:
Bit another player.

	Suarez was allowed to finish the game, as the referee did not see the event. He had been caught two other times previously (once in The Netherlands and once in England) biting another player in a match.

questions.text: Which of the following teams did NOT make it to the round of 16?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	Italy won only one of its three games in the group stage, beating England 2-1.

questions.text: Which of the following games was decided by a shoot-out, penalty kicks?
questions.explanation:
Brazil vs Chile.

	At the end of extra time, Brazil and Chile were tied at one each. Brazil won the match, making one more penalty then Chile. Japan did tie with Greece in the group stage, however, games in the group stage are allowed to end in a tie, so no penalties were necessary.

questions.text: Which goalie broke a record by making 15 (originally counted as 16) saves in a single game?
questions.explanation:
Tim Howard.

	Tim Howard (USA) set this record in a match against Belgium. Belgium won 2-1 in extra time. FIFA began tracking this statistic at the 1966 World Cup in England. The previous record was the 13 saves made by Ramon Quiroga (Peru) in a 0-0 draw vs. The Netherlands.

questions.text: Brazil versus Germany semifinal was one of the highest scoring matches in World Cup history. How many goals did Germany win by?
questions.explanation:
6.

	The final score was 7-1. Brazil was missing both Neymar and Silva, two of the county's star players. This was the first time Brazil lost on its home field in a competitive match since 1975, when they lost 1-3 to Peru in the semi-final (first leg) of the Copa America. It was also their biggest-ever home defeat (previously 1-5 vs. Argentina in 1939).

questions.text: Who played Germany in the World Cup final?
questions.explanation:
Argentina.

	The final score was 1-0 Germany. Gotze scored in the 113th minute.

questions.text: Which of the following players was NOT their country's team captain?
questions.explanation:
Cillessen.

	Cillessen played for The Netherlands as the team's goalie. Ronaldo was the captain of Portugal, Messi for Argentina, and Lahm for Germany.

questions.text: Which of the following players did NOT receive a red card in the World Cup?
questions.explanation:
Toby Alderweireld.

	Toby Alderweireld played for the Belgians. He received two yellow cards throughout the World Cup, one against Russia, the other against Argentina, but did not receive a red card.

questions.text: After losing to Germany in their semi-final, Brazil faced the Netherlands for the prize of third place. By how many goals did The Netherlands win?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Van Persie scored on a penalty kick in the 3rd minute. Blind scored in the 17th minute, and Wijnaldum scored in the 91st minute.
